reviews.title: Great B2B Delivery Experience
reviews.text:
The platform's tech and user-friendly interface makes scheduling deliveries so convenient. 

One of the standout features of FRAYT is its range of vehicle options, so they cater to various shipment sizes and requirements. They are able to match you with the best suited vehicle and professional local driver to handle deliveries.

The flexibility of delivery options, including on-demand, same day, and scheduled deliveries, align perfectly with dynamic business operations.

The real-time tracking feature provides end-to-end visibility, allowing us to promptly monitor deliveries. 

I highly recommend FRAYT to any business looking for a reliable delivery solution.

reviews.title: Great gig App
reviews.text: If you want to make money, this is the way to go. This is like Uber only you deliver small packages using either your car or a pick up truck or a van. The pay is quick. And the customers are very nice.

reviews.title: 35$ to time ðŸ˜¯
reviews.text:
Upon registration, the app asked me to pay $35 for the purpose of a background check.
I found that he then deducted the amount twice from my account.
And the application is still asking for payment again, and the support is not answered

reviews.title: DO NOT HIRE!!! (For business nor personal use)
reviews.text:
1) Unclarified changes in policy- no longer do personal/home furniture deliveries however still allows you to schedule and input your payment information.
2) Change in policy to one driver - Means any desk, lobby furniture, or other large items will not be delivered (unless you or an employee is sent to meet the driver and help load but even then they may not deliver).
3) Poor customer service - Unhelpful in solving problems, do not listen to suggestions or offer apologies for the inconvenience.
4) False charges advertising - Was shown service charges would be $39.99 + tax. However was charged $59.98
MAIN TAKEAWAY: Overall horrible company which should be reported to the BBB. DO NOT HIRE! You will be better off through a different company even if charged a bit more.

reviews.title: No call â€” No show
reviews.text:
I scheduled a pickup an hour in advance and the driver cancelled five minutes after he was supposed to arrive.

The app has a great concept, but thereâ€™s no accountability on their end to fulfill agreements.

While another company delivered my items â€” two hours late thanks to Frayt â€” customer service didnâ€™t have the nerve to call me back.

Unprofessional and clearly unreliable.

reviews.title: Poor Automatic Decisions
reviews.text:
I have a 16â€™ box truck, commercial insurance, and free time. Automatically declined in 1.5 seconds. Zero points on my license. Full coverage. No claims 15 years. Over 1 million professional miles.

This will fail. If they are not using good people they can only be using bad.

Donâ€™t board a sinking ship.

Response is laughable and in no way addresses the concerns I raised.

Why on earth would I seek to remedy YOUR poor decision making and faulty procedures?

reviews.title: Beware of this Company
reviews.text: I made arrangements 3 days in advance. The driver never showed, called or anything.  The company didnâ€™t know what to do left me hanging making me and my business look unprofessional because I trusted them. Poorly ran company they trust drivers that donâ€™t care.  After trying to post on their Facebook account other people are reaching out to me that had the same experience with them. They donâ€™t care did nothing to make it right had a lot of excuses but none of them got the job done.  Extremely dissatisfied

reviews.title: Awesome Service
reviews.text: Frayt really helped me out. I expressed how urgent my issue was and they were very helpful.Their support texted me continuously with updates until they found a driver (and this was very last minute). Extremely helpful, courteous and professional. Highly recommend!

reviews.title: Question
reviews.text: Which one is driver app and which one is customer app because we have two different app one is orange and the other one is blue , which one is for delivery driver?

reviews.title: They do not care
reviews.text: The people that work at this company do not care about their customers or their contactors

reviews.text: Great new App going to be Game changer Iâ€™ve already completed close to 30 Loads with this App highly recommended!

reviews.title: Why doesnâ€™t this app work?
reviews.text: I signed up using this app. This company has my personal information and vehicle information. Iâ€™ve sent an email, I left a voicemail for, and left a message on Facebook for John Mueller to assist me with the problem with this app. The payment app Frayt prompted me to use is Stripe. The problem is that Stripe has a pop up that interferes with selecting a match for a driving job. Itâ€™s impossible to use the app, even though Iâ€™ve already signed up with Stripe. Iâ€™m really at a loss and vulnerable at this point. Until someone from the company reaches out to me to solve this problem, I cannot recommend that anyone seeking a driving job use this app.

reviews.title: Is this app a joke?
reviews.text: I have been trying to get signed up for over 3 weeks. It keeps telling me there is a bug. So if this is a legit company you would think it would be a top priority for to fix their app. It seems that all their freight is moved through the app so what gives?
